    • Highlights

      • Explore Mamallapuram, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, known for its rock-cut temples and ancient sculptures.
      • Visit the Shore Temple, Arjuna’s Penance, and the famous Pancha Rathas in Mamallapuram.
      • Discover the vibrant French influence and colonial charm of Pondicherry.
      • Stroll along Pondicherry’s serene beaches and enjoy its unique blend of French and Tamil cultures.
      • Relax by the beach, enjoy local cuisine, and explore popular spots like Auroville and the French Quarter.

    Mamallapuram with Pondicherry Getaway - 3 Nights / 4 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Mamallapuram

    • Arrive in Mamallapuram and check in to your hotel.
    • Visit the iconic Shore Temple and explore the beautifully carved Arjuna's Penance.
    • Evening at leisure to explore the local markets or enjoy the coastal views.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Mamallapuram.

    Day 2: Mamallapuram Sightseeing

    • After breakfast, visit the Pancha Rathas and other rock-cut monuments.
    • Enjoy a guided tour of Mamallapuram’s ancient temples and sculptures.
    • Afternoon at leisure or optional activities like beachside relaxation.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Mamallapuram.

    Day 3: Transfer to Pondicherry

    • After breakfast, drive to Pondicherry, a charming town with French colonial influence.
    • Check in to your hotel and explore attractions like the French Quarter and Promenade Beach.
    • Visit Auroville and enjoy the evening in the vibrant White Town area.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Pondicherry.

    Day 4: Departure from Pondicherry

    • After breakfast, check out and prepare for departure.
    • Transfer to the nearest airport or railway station for your onward journey.
    • End of the Mamallapuram with Pondicherry Getaway.
